title: Living and Non-Living Things
content: Pupils learn to identify things that are alive and things that are not. Activities include observing, sorting, and drawing objects.

title: Plants Around Us
content: Introduction to common plants and their uses. Pupils explore the environment to recognize different plants.
examples: Uses: Mango tree for fruits, Flowers for decoration

title: Animals Around Us
content: Learn about common animals, their habitats, and whether they are domestic or wild.
